info.title: Application Model Manager
info.description: Provides na interface for some basic functionality for applications.

method.name: getTeamApplicationPath
method.description: Get the application service path inside the team folder.
method.returndescription: The application path or NULL if there is no active application.

method.name: getAccountApplicationPath
method.description: Get the application service path inside the account folder.
method.returndescription: The application path or NULL if there is no active application.

method.name: getServiceName
method.description: Get the application folder name as a service.
